{"id":664169012,"lang":"cpp","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1647838872,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"9 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/664169012/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"6.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int ans =1;\n    int maxPower(string s) {\n        \n        int prev = s[0];\n        int count = 1 ;\n        for(int i =1 ;i<s.size();i++){\n            if(s[i] == prev){\n                count++;\n            }\n            else{\n                count =1;\n            }\n            ans = max(ans,count);\n            prev = s[i];\n        }\n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
